name: Medjoul Dates
description: Medjoul dates are considered the king of dates. They're large, soft, and incredibly sweet with a rich, complex flavor profile. Known for their luxurious texture and caramel-like taste.
characteristics: Large size, soft texture, rich caramel taste, complex flavor

packaging.naturalClaim: 100% NATURAL - No added Sugars, No Preservatives, No Additives

terroir.geography: Jordan Valley - 390 meters below sea level (lowest point on Earth), air enriched with highest oxygen levels
terroir.climate: 258 sunny days per year, exceptionally high temperatures, low humidity, minimal rainfall
terroir.soil: Semi-clayish fertile soil, unique mineral composition from Jordan River valley
terroir.waterSource: Jordan River - from Lake Tiberias through Dead Sea to Red Sea
terroir.whySpecial: Medjoul dates can grow only in very few areas worldwide (California, Mexico, Jordan Valley, parts of Africa). Attempts to cultivate elsewhere have not delivered the special quality and taste criteria. Jordan Valley terroir is unmatched.

originStory: The Jordan Valley is renowned as the best place in the world for cultivating Medjoul dates. At 390 meters below sea level, the air is oxygen-rich and the climate perfect - 258 sunny days per year with minimal rainfall. The unique semi-clayish soil and fabulous climate during winter give Medjoul dates an exclusive flavor. These 'king of dates' naturally grow larger while maintaining rich taste and luxurious texture that simply cannot be replicated elsewhere.
tastingNotes: Rich caramel notes, soft and creamy texture, naturally sweet without cloying, complex flavor profile with hints of coffee and chocolate
whyWeCare: We source from the Jordan Valley because it's the only place on Earth that produces Medjoul dates with this exceptional quality. This is terroir at its finest - like Champagne from Champagne. No other origin can replicate the unique combination of altitude, climate, and soil that creates these extraordinary dates.
customerInsight: Customer quote: 'Flyberry Medjoul dates are as good as the ones I bought in Dubai' - validating our sourcing from the authentic Jordan Valley origin

nutritionalHighlights.reason: The largest, softest, and most prized date variety with exceptional nutritional benefits for active lifestyles.
